mapper.insert: insert into tbl_calendar (calno, fk_cno, calname, color, shareEmp) values(calnoSeq.nextval, #{fk_cno}, #{calname}, #{color}, #{shareEmp})
mapper.select: select calno, calname, color, fk_cno, shareemp from tbl_calendar where shareemp like '%'|| #{empid} ||'%'

mapper.update: update tbl_calendar set calname= #{calname} , color= #{color} where calno= #{calno} and fk_cno = 1
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_calendar where calno= #{calno} and fk_cno = 1
